title: Conditional Formatting with Web URL in Table or Matrix Visual
excerpt: In this video, we will talk about setting the web URL or a hyperlink on a table or Matrix value in Power BI Desktop.  During December 2019, Microsoft rolled out a feature to add the conditional formatting on a table or Matrix’s column.  If you really like this video don’t forget to subscribe to my channel.
